revised_title: New Phase-Integral Quantization Conditions for Diatomic Dipole Molecule in Electric Field
tldr: The authors present new phase-integral quantization conditions for the energy levels of a rigid diatomic dipole molecule in a homogeneous electric field. These conditions are expressed in terms of complete elliptic integrals and are accurate for arbitrary values of the magnetic quantum number. The study covers two choices of the base function, one for large values of the magnetic quantum number and another for small values. The results demonstrate the accuracy of the eigenvalues obtained from the quantization conditions.
